# Book.OpenRead method

Openes an existing book for read-only.

```csharp
public static Book OpenRead(GnuCashUri uri)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| uri | URI to the book. |

## Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| GnuCashBackendException | Throws when an error occured while opening the book. |
